upgrade.0: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.
upgrade.1: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 75%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 60%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 300.
upgrade.2: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 90%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 72%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 360.
upgrade.3: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 105%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 84%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 420.
upgrade.4: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 120%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 96%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 480.

upgrade.0: 角色登场时，随机获得一个主题曲，持续10秒。每30秒只能触发一次。宣叙调：攻击力提升60%；咏叹调：全元素伤害提升48%;间奏曲：元素精通提升240。

upgrade.0: キャラ登場時、ランダムにテーマ曲を1つ獲得する、継続時間10秒。30秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。叙唱：攻撃力+60%。詠唱：全元素ダメージ+48%。間奏曲：元素熟知+240。
